notes: Field-aware guidance for collecting service/auth requests with high-quality, minimally ambiguous answers.

name.purpose: Identify the requester with a full legal name.
name.format: First Last (Title Case). Avoid extra words.

email.format: Valid email address. Prefer company domain if available.
email.validation: Must match standard email pattern user@domain.tld

issue_details.purpose: Brief, actionable description that enables triage.
examples: Wi‑Fi drops frequently on 3rd floor near conference rooms; affecting calls.
Unable to access Jira; SSO fails with ‘Invalid session’.

urgency.format: One of: low, medium, high, critical. Choose based on scope/impact.
urgency.guidance: Critical: outage or severe impact; High: major impact; Medium: limited impact; Low: minor/inconvenience.

location.format: One of: office, site, remote. Synonyms: office=hq/headquarters, site=onsite/on site, remote=home/wfh.
